data.title: About 3 — Progressive Agriculture Safety Day
data.text:
Foundation

The Progressive Agriculture Foundation® (PAF) is a 501(c)(3) charitable organization that governs and secures funding for the Progressive Agriculture Safety Day® program, with the mission to provide education, training, and resources to make farm, ranch and rural life safer and healthier for all children and their communities. PAF builds partnerships to secure resources for the Progressive Agriculture Safety Day® (PAF Safety Day) program, which is recognized as the largest rural safety and health education program for children in North America.

The Progressive Agriculture Foundation IRS Tax I.D. number is 63-1166618.

Our Mission

Provide education, training, and resources to make farm, ranch, and rural life safer and healthier for all children and their communities.

Our Vision

No child would become ill, injured or die from farm, ranch and rural activities.

Our Diversity, Equity, Inclusion, and Accessibility (DEIA) Statement

At the Progressive Agriculture Foundation, we believe in fostering a culture that embraces and celebrates the unique perspectives, backgrounds, talents, and abilities of every individual.

We are committed to creating an inclusive environment where diversity is not only acknowledged but also valued. We recognize that diverse experiences and ideas contribute to innovation and excellence. Our commitment to equity ensures that everyone, regardless of their background, has equal access to opportunities, resources, and a supportive environment.

We are dedicated to continuous learning and improvement in our DEI efforts. By fostering an inclusive atmosphere, we aim to empower and educate not only children but all individuals to reach their full potential, contribute their unique strengths, and collectively work towards reflecting the richness of human diversity.

At the Progressive Agriculture Foundation, we stand united in our continued commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion, recognizing that these values not only strengthen our organization but also contribute to the betterment of the communities we serve.
